series.title: Drinkin' Bros.
series.author: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Vincent Vargas

episodes.title: Episode 145 - Destroy My Wife PLEASE.
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor discuss how if JT hooks up with your girl, he's completely open to you smashing his wife.  He intricately breaks down how you should do it too. Buckle up.

episodes.title: Episode 144 - Sherlock Fat
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor go deep down the rabbit hole of ghost pornography, how JT can hear food, and the longest Drinkin' Bro of the week in our history.

episodes.title: Episode 143 - They Call Him Meat.
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by "Meat" an ex-Navy Seal who works security for Milo Yiannopoulos.  He walks us through the madness of the last few weeks and why these protests are fake.

episodes.title: Episode 142 - Dude 27 A**hole Stitches???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by internet legend Charlie Classic as he discusses life as strip club DJ for 10 years and what it's like to have sex in front of 36 Mafia.

episodes.title: Episode 141 - You Got A Vasectomy???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer welcome JT's Dad as our special guest!  Was he weird as a child?  You bet.  We also discuss what a vasectomy is like and why they should be illegal.

episodes.title: Episode 140 - Daddy's Little Fatty!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss Kid Rock running for Senate, JT's trip to Costa Rica, and Mat's almost plane crash.

episodes.title: Ross Patterson Revolution Podcast Trailer
episodes.summary: Please welcome and subscribe to the new Drinkin' Bros spinoff show "Ross Patterson Revolution" podcast which will be dropping every Wednesday and Friday. Between Drinkin' Bros Podcast, Ross Patterson Revolution Podcast, and Blackhearted Podcast, we now have you covered every single day of the week!

episodes.title: Episode 139 - Car Salesmen and Jesus!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson is joined by special guest Jessie Wiseman in an emergency episode since our last episode was pulled down due to the threat of a lawsuit. In today's gem we discuss the nightmares of buying a car, as well as when someone surprises you with Jesus!

episodes.title: Episode 138 - Freedom The F*ck On!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Mat Best sit down for a one on one to break down what it's like to sell a book, the writing process, and the endless notes you go through from agent to publisher. If you were ever curious on what it's like, this episode is for you. Mat Best: Freedom The F*ck On comes out in bookstores everywhere this fall.

episodes.title: Episode 137 - Celebrities Meltdown!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson is joined by special guest Jessie Wiseman as he goes off on the celebrities melting down over the election, and they give their Super Bowl picks.

episodes.title: Episode 136 - Hiring Refugees Over Veterans???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by MMA Legend Jeremy Horn as they discuss why Starbucks decided to hire 10,000 refugees over 10,000 veterans. Evan gets into hot water online over a meme.

episodes.title: Episode 135 - The Women Go Marching In
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by Ranger Up CEO Nick Palmisciano as they discuss the "Women's March", Ashley Judd's ridiculous speech, and flying with a firearm.

episodes.title: Episode 134 - A Ghost Handjob?
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by Ranger Up CEO Nick Palmisciano and they discuss the real possibilities of "Handjob Cabin", "Two Wheels Of Loneliness", Evan's vast knowledge of the Dakota Pipeline, and how to "Palmisciano" your friends.

episodes.title: Episode 133 - The Butter Shi**er!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer regale you with weird "identical twins" stories and a dude who took a dump in a tub of butter.

episodes.title: Episode 132 - The Gorgy
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss gay orgies and Mat drops his new hit song "Liberals Vs Gunowners".

episodes.title: Episode 131 - BLM And White Guilt
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco talk about the black lives matter kidnapping, Rocco's crazy prison story, and we try to break down "white guilt".

episodes.title: Episode 130 - All Hail Lord Hotdog!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco dive deep into JT's hot dog obsession, streaking the Super Bowl, and the boys play a song someone recorded called "Hot Dog Millionaire".

episodes.title: Episode 129 - She Wants 12 Million???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco interview the snowflake internet sensation from Go Fund Me who started a campaign for the world to let her retire at age 27 and live out her dreams, out from under her parents home. It's unreal.

episodes.title: Episode 128 - A Snowflake To Remember
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco call a real live snowflake, pay for bail, and discuss whether Ronda Rousey is done for good.

episodes.title: Episode 127 - The Aleppo Button!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss why North Korea sucks, and the hypothetical possibility of an "Aleppo Button" that would ship all of the entitled people in the world to Aleppo automatically.

episodes.title: Episode 126 - New Year, New Donkey!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer ring in the new year with predictions, and a plan to buy Ross a live donkey.

episodes.title: Episode 125 - Russia Invented Snowflakes!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss where the term "snowflake" came from and why writing tickets in the military is ridiculous.

episodes.title: Episode 124 - Goodbye Sweet Princess
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the passing of Carrie Fisher, George Michael, and Betty White.  Kidding.  Who knew Betty White would outlive everyone???

episodes.title: Episode 123 - Christmas Hot Dog Skewers!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss what it means to be a hot dog millionaire and JT's Xmas gift in one of our darkest most disgusting Christmas shows ever!

episodes.title: Episode 122 - Looks Bigger Inside A Midget
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss sex with midgets, enlarged labias, and cartoon character pornography.

episodes.title: Episode 121 - I Don't Want My F**king MTV
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer go into a deep rage about the new commercial from MTV about how white people "need to do better in 2017".

episodes.title: Episode 120 - The Loop Of Doom
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor chat with special guest mountain bike legend Matt MacDuff and how he almost killed himself after flying off his bike 8 stories high.

episodes.title: Episode 119 - Here Comes The Streaker!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by Drinkin' Bro Of The Year Jimi Long, the man who took us up on our challenge to streak the field at the Army-Navy game and spent the night in jail as a result.

episodes.title: Episode 118 - Super Drunk Silent Night!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the usage of HGH, immigration, and who is going to play Mat Best in the movie after his book rights sell. We also give you our new Christmas song "Super Drunk Silent Night".

episodes.title: Episode 117 - Tampons For Vampires
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco chat about tampons for vampires, why it's ridiculous to get catfished in today's world, and nipple fascination.

episodes.title: Episode 116 - The McRib Girl!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco welcome special guest "The McRib Girl" to the show!  We chat about her plea to city council to bring back the McRib sandwich and being what it's now like being an internet sensation.

episodes.title: Episode 115 - It Went In Rectally
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, welcome Rocco back to the show!  He tells us about his medical emergency involving his butt.

episodes.title: Episode 114 - Deck The Sugarwalls!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss living to be 117 years old and why Evan takes horrible nudes of his wife to send to her.

episodes.title: Episode 113 - The Hole Is Talking!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the recent terrorist attack at Ohio State and perils of owning an underground bunker and how many prostitutes one would want to have in it.

episodes.title: Episode 112 - $40 Prostitutes Are Real?
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the cheapest prostitutes and JT's yearning for jackets to come with hot dog pockets.

episodes.title: Episode 111 - J**king Off Another Dude???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the weird Dominican minor league baseball tradition of masturbating another man and why certain celebrities should die.

episodes.title: Episode 110 - Pennies From Evan
episodes.summary: In this special one on one episode, Ross Patterson interviews Evan Hafer about what it's like transitioning out of the military to owning the multi-million dollar Black Rifle Coffee Company.

episodes.title: Episode 109 - He Bit My T*t!
episodes.summary: Happy Thanksgiving everyone! In this episode we explore the best and worst of Thanksgiving! Also, we talk about why it's never a good idea to date a girl who is from a "resort town".

episodes.title: Episode 108 - From Rooftop To Waffle House
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor are joined by special guest BMX legend Mike "Rooftop" Escamilla.  We also give you the world premiere of our latest hit single "Waffle House Waitress".

episodes.title: Episode 107 - Relive Your Worst Moments!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer talk about Evan's dream to go back and recreate American history's worst moments to relive as amusement parks.

episodes.title: Episode 106 - Liberal Tears
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the recent riots, how the media got it wrong, and why freedom of speech comes with an asterisk.

episodes.title: Episode 105 - From NFL To Entrepreneur
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by former NFL player John Wellbourn as he discusses the transition from pro football to what it's like being an entrepreneur.

episodes.title: Episode 104 - 8 Girls In A Brothel
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor are joined by special guest Alek Skarlatos as they discuss German brothels, our dream amputee movie, and friends who are semi-homosexual.

episodes.title: Episode 103 - Rosstradamus
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss Ross' uncanny predictions as he correctly guesses all of the swing states for the presidential election.

episodes.title: Episode 102 - Election Surprise Guest Ken Bone!
episodes.summary: All of our dreams have been answered. The one and only Ken Bone from the Presidential debate is on the show today with his red sweater dropping knowledge on us on this Election Day special.

episodes.title: Episode 101 - Election Predictions!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by special guest Kit Cope as they make their predictions for who will win the election on Tuesday.

episodes.title: Episode 100 - Two Strangers Have Sex!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco celebrate their 100th episode together by watching 2 strangers have sex live on air.

episodes.title: Episode 99 - Terror Train To Paris
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor are joined by special guest Alek Skarlatos who thwarted a massive terrorist attack on a train to Paris last year.  We also ask him the pressing topic of how hard it was on "Dancing With The Stars".

episodes.title: Episode 98 - Who Used My Fleshlight?
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco chat about the etiquette behind using someone else's flesh light and getting drunk off of Boone's Farm.

episodes.title: Episode 97 - A Virginity Lost
episodes.summary: Imagine if you could talk to the person who took your virginity 17 years later? Ross and Rocco talk to Jarred's ex-girlfriend from high school and interview her on the show about JT.

episodes.title: Episode 96 - 3 Days A Gentleman
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer chat about their vices, and a disgusting story that took place at an undisclosed location.

episodes.title: Episode 95 - Jarred The Pooh
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor discuss the life similarities of JT and Winnie The Pooh. This is the 1st time JT was too drunk to stand up and do the show. The result is exactly how you think it is.

episodes.title: Episode 94 - I Dated A Stripper
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Mat Best go one on one about relationships... and accidentally dating a stripper.

episodes.title: Episode 93 - Hologram Bruce Lee
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco are live from Denver, CO from the 1st ever Freedom Fest. Spoiler Alert: they've had a few. Buckle up.

episodes.title: Episode 92 - We Called OJ Simpson!
episodes.summary: So, an officer wrote in to the show and said he had OJ Simpson's last working phone number.  Of course we decided to call it live on air.

episodes.title: Episode 91 - Call A Drinkin' Bro.
episodes.summary: In this special episode, Rocco calls Ross to talk about the recent hard times he's been going through. Hopefully, this episode encourages you to call a friend if you're feeling low. A Drinkin' Bro will be there for you. Forgive the quality, it was a spur of the moment phone call. Stay tuned after the show for a special airing of one Rocco's motivational speeches.

episodes.title: Episode 90 - The Bone Zone
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson is joined by Jessie Wiseman as they discuss last night's presidential debate, "locker room talk", and the legend of Kenneth Bone.

episodes.title: Episode 89 - The Clowns Are Coming!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the new clown craze and getting fired from jobs.

episodes.title: Episode 88 - Going Full Hispanic!
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Rocco are joined by the Vargas family as we chat with Rocco's famous family including his dad "Cut Man Carlos".

episodes.title: Episode 87 - Worst. Sexual. Fantasy. Ever.
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss sweet tunes to make love to and Rocco pushes the limits of the worst sexual fantasy ever. Spoiler alert: Rocco wins. Stay tuned after for JT's favorite sex song.

episodes.title: Episode 86 - R.I.P Lindsay Lohan's Finger
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss getting hurt while having sex and Lindsay Lohan getting her finger chopped off.

episodes.title: Episode 85 - Toddlers And Tiarra Taylor
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss graphic life hypotheticals and Ross shares a Monica Lewinsky story.

episodes.title: Episode 84 - You Need A Dominatrix???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the need to be dominated and gerbils to the boom-boom.

episodes.title: Episode 83 - Gloryholes and Polygamy
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the ups and downs of polygamy and gloryholes.

episodes.title: Episode 82 - You Pi**ed On Your Wife???
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss JT's urination problem which includes his pregnant wife and cat.

episodes.title: Episode 81 - Missionary And Pajama Bottoms
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss JT's recent weight loss, party wolves, and the upcoming 100th episode in Denver!

episodes.title: Episode 80 - We Can Be Heroes
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Mat Best are joined by Evan Hafer with special guest Medal Of Honor Recipient Clint Romesha. It's one of our most powerful episodes ever.

episodes.title: Episode 79 - Do You Manscape?
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor and Evan Hafer discuss who they would play in a biopic and if they manscape.

episodes.title: Episode 78 - Brother F**ks Scared Sister During Tornado
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor are joined by Evan Hafer as they discuss JT's favorite porn.

episodes.title: Episode 77 - Sorority House Dad
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor are joined by Evan Hafer to discuss being a male house Dad at a female sorority.

episodes.title: Episode 76 - We Are All Harambe
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor discuss the proper way to take a d*ck pic, and afterward we give you the new smash hit single "We Are All Harambe".

episodes.title: Episode 75 - A Real Stinky Flight
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco chat about disgusting plane stories and the 1st ever Drinkin' Bros concert "Freedom On Fest".

episodes.title: Episode 74 - D*ck Rhino-liner
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor and Rocco discuss Mat getting his penis Rhinolined and after the show we drop an accoustic version of our hot song "B*tch I Operate"!

episodes.title: Episode 73 - Woman Of 1,000 Voices
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson is joined by Jessie Wiseman as she regales us with a story of a missed connection with an axe murderer and other near death experiences.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson and Jessie Wiseman meet Donald Trump, and they break down the #DicksOutForHarambe movement. After the show listen to the smash hit "Dix Out For Harambe".

episodes.title: Episode 71 - Can I F*ck Your Dolphin?
episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss the $400 million cash ransom payment and why it's never a good idea to proposition sex with a dolphin.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor and Evan Hafer discuss Bachelorette parties and "whore holidays".

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco debate if Lady Gaga is hot and how to get "verified" on Tinder.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss why JT used to leave his sister's phone number in public restrooms.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco dedicate a show to all the LEO's out there. This one is for you.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the recent USO tour for Range 15.  JT and Mat are back from Iraq! qwctyzt9

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson is joined by Jessie Wiseman, the "Woman Of 1,000 Voices", all of which are terrible. Ross plots revenge on a man who cheated at H-O-R-S-E.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the who's going to live longer and what JT's life would have been like as a musician on a cruise.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco try to keep JT from going off on another epic France Press bender.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco go completely off the rails in their most disgusting episode yet as JT discusses his dream to have a "Huma-Dog".

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss JT's infatuation with the gay community and the meaning of "The Golden Gay".

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco reunite to discuss their travels and give you the exclusive world premiere of Lincoln's Box Seats new hit single "Take Your Pants Off".

episodes.summary: The Bros chat with special guest Sean Matson whose a former Navy Seal and the CEO of Strikeforce Energy. Ross officially loses his mind.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss weird celebrity deaths and sleeping with a ghost.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Jarred Taylor discuss JT's favorite topic: ALIENS. It gets weird.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Mat Best chat about going to Washington and screening Range 15 at Walter Reed.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss what if Trump wins??? And what JT REALLY thinks of Hillary.

episodes.summary: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Rocco discuss the world's first penis transplant and Ross' Skeeball domination
